title: Highest earning eSports countries in 2018 , by prize winnings
yAxis: Prize money in million U.S. dollars
summary: This is a bar chart representing Country in the x axis and Prize money in million U.S. dollars in the y axis.
Country United States has the highest Prize money in million U.S. dollars and Germany has the lowest Prize money in million U.S. dollars.
The highest Country United States has 23.91 more Prize money in million U.S. dollars than the lowest Country Germany.
min_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Prize money in million U.S. dollars for 10 number of Countrys.
The Prize money in million U.S. dollars is highest at Country United States and lowest at Country Germany.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart representing Country in the x axis and Prize money in million U.S. dollars in the y axis.
Country United States has the highest Prize money in million U.S. dollars and Germany has the lowest Prize money in million U.S. dollars.
The highest Country United States has 23.91 more Prize money in million U.S. dollars than the lowest Country Germany.
max_summary: This bar chart has 10 columns on the x axis representing Country, and Prize money in million U.S. dollars in each Country on the y axis.
Country United States has the highest Prize money in million U.S. dollars and Germany has the lowest Prize money in million U.S. dollars.
Country China has the second highest value for Prize money in million U.S. dollars.
The highest value at Country United States is 6.75x times more than the lowest value at Germany.
Prize money in million U.S. dollars at Country United States is 28.07 , second place is China at 16.02, and thirdly is South Korea at 13.54.
The highest value 28.07 at United States is almost 2.72 times larger than the average value 10.34.
The Prize money in million U.S. dollars is 103.37 if we add up values of all Countrys.
